Changing Comparison Order

In Visual Diff, the file in the left pane (the first file you selected) is compared to the file in the right pane (the second file you selected). Text in the first file but not in the second is marked as deleted. Text in the second file, but not in the first file, is marked as added.

If desired, you can change the order in which the files are compared. Text previously marked as deleted will then be marked as added, etc.

To change the comparison order:

In the Visual Diff window, do one of the following:

    • Select Window > Switch Comparison Order from the menu bar.

    • Click the Switch Comparison Order button on the toolbar.
